review: I love this product. I also have a google chromecast, and let me tell you, there is no comparison. We use to have a playstation 3 that stopped working and we were devastated because we would use netflix and amazon prime on it. So our friends gave us the chromecast for christmas, and we were excited to try it. Issue with the chromecast, is you need to have the app of whatever you want to use on your phone or tablet or computer. The chromecast would continuously disconnect and using the app version on the phone or tablet, did not have continuous play. And you had to make sure your device was plugged in because this drains your battery. After all the issues, i decided to get the Fire. WOW! what a difference. It has a similar interface like the playstation and the apps are already on the stick. You have continuous play on it and you can see both amazon prime and netflix on the firestick, including youtube. The fact that this comes with a remote is even better because you can maneuver through the apps seamlessly. I would recommend this product to everyone.
